description: Creates an Amazon Q in Connect assistant.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If not provided, the Amazon Web Services SDK populates this field. For more information about idempotency, see Making retries safe with idempotent APIs. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: serverSideEncryptionConfiguration
parameters.description: The configuration information for the customer managed key used for encryption. The customer managed key must have a policy that allows kms:CreateGrant, kms:DescribeKey, kms:Decrypt, and kms:GenerateDataKey* permissions to the IAM identity using the key to invoke Amazon Q in Connect. To use Amazon Q in Connect with chat, the key policy must also allow kms:Decrypt, kms:GenerateDataKey*, and kms:DescribeKey permissions to the connect.amazonaws.com service principal. For more information about setting up a customer managed key for Amazon Q in Connect, see Enable Amazon Q in Connect for your instance. kmsKeyId (string) --- The customer managed key used for encryption. For information about valid ID values, see Key identifiers (KeyId).

nested_params.name: kmsKeyId
nested_params.description: The customer managed key used for encryption. For more information about setting up a customer managed key for Amazon Q in Connect, see Enable Amazon Q in Connect for your instance. For information about valid ID values, see Key identifiers (KeyId).

nested_items.name: assistantId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q in Connect assistant.

nested_items.name: assistantArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Q in Connect assistant.

nested_items.name: serverSideEncryptionConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration information for the customer managed key used for encryption.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The customer managed key used for encryption. For more information about setting up a customer managed key for Amazon Q in Connect, see Enable Amazon Q in Connect for your instance. For information about valid ID values, see Key identifiers (KeyId).

nested_items.name: integrationConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration information for the Amazon Q in Connect assistant integration.

nested_items.name: topicIntegrationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the integrated Amazon SNS topic used for streaming chat messages.

nested_items.name: capabilityConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration information for the Amazon Q in Connect assistant capability.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of Amazon Q in Connect assistant capability.

nested_items.name: aiAgentConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration of the AI Agents (mapped by AI Agent Type to AI Agent version) that is set on the Amazon Q in Connect Assistant.

nested_items.name: aiAgentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the AI Agent to be configured.
